defensive.name: Defensive
defensive.description: Gain an additional +${x} Defense when performing the _Guard_ action.

uses.name: Uses(x)
uses.description: This item may be used ${x} times per game.

light.name: Light
light.description: May _Use_ to increase location brightness for 3 rounds.

sweeping.name: Sweeping
sweeping.description: Attacks with this weapon may be performed against up to ${x} _Engaged_ enemies (one at a time).

piercing.name: Piercing
piercing.description: Attacks with this weapon reduce enemy _Defense_ by ${x}.

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: You must spend an action to _Reload_ this weapon before attacking with it again.
